DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 1 study evaluate pharmacokinetics ITCA 650 subject mild moderate renal impairment compare pharmacokinetics subject normal renal function
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics ITCA 650 Subjects With Renal Impairment Compared Normal Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 22 40 kg/m² Subjects meeting predefined estimate glomerular filtration rate criterion creatinine clearance rate Normal ( ≥90 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Mild ( 6089 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Moderate ( 4559 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Moderate ( > 3044 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) History acute metabolic complication Uncontrolled Hypertension History Hypersensitivity Exenatide Cardiovascular Disease History Acute chronic pancreatitis Personal family history Multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2 History Medullary thyroid cancer Severe renal failure , End stage renal disease dialysis
